ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) package deluxe macaroni and cheese dinner mix
1 (12 ounce) can luncheon meat (such as Spam), cut into 1/4-inch cubes

cookingTips: Cut Spam into uniform ¼-inch cubes for consistent cooking
Brown Spam cubes in a separate skillet before adding to the pasta
Sprinkle bread crumbs on top before baking for a crispy crust
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why would browning the Spam separately improve the dish's overall flavor and texture?
